salaryExpectations: LKR 60,000 (Assistant Designer) to LKR 200,000+ (Designer). Highly variable for own brand.
futureOutlook: The path of a tailor is a stable skilled trade. The path of a fashion designer is a highly competitive creative field. Success as a designer in Sri Lanka requires building a strong, unique brand identity and good business sense. The apparel industry also offers stable careers for designers who work for large manufacturing and retail companies.
